H0.text: Circulatory is the system that produces most of the hormones in the human body.

H1.text: The digestive system is the system that produces most of the hormones in the human body.

H2.text: The endocrine system produces most of the hormones in the human body.

H3.text: Respiratory is the system that produces most of the hormones in the human body.

A4.text: The endocrine system comprises glands that secrete hormones directly into the circulatory system.

A5.text: The glands that secrete hormones comprise the endocrine system.
